text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Totally support you, dear President! Have a look of the age distribution of Coronavirus deaths. Guess there are huge overlap with natural deaths. Donot forgot there is 8 deaths per thousand during normal days! Stop locking down cities. Democratic Party is totally stupid on it.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
